001package com.github.sormuras.bach.external;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.ExternalModuleLocator;
004
005/** Locates "Gluon Attach" modules via their Maven Central artifacts. */
006public record GluonAttach(String version) implements ExternalModuleLocator {
007
008  private static final String MODULE_PREFIX = "com.gluonhq.attach";
009  private static final String MAVEN_GROUP = "com.gluonhq.attach";
010
011  /**
012   * Constructs a new Gluon Attach module locator with the given version.
013   *
014   * @param version the Gluon Attach version
015   */
016  public static GluonAttach version(String version) {
017    return new GluonAttach(version);
018  }
019
020  @Override
021  public String caption() {
022    return "com.gluonhq.attach.[*] -> Gluon Attach " + version;
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public String locate(String module) {
027    if (!module.startsWith(MODULE_PREFIX)) return null;
028    var artifact =
029        switch (module) {
030          case "com.gluonhq.attach.audiorecording" -> "audio-recording";
031          case "com.gluonhq.attach.augmentedreality" -> "augmented-reality";
032          case "com.gluonhq.attach.barcodescan" -> "barcode-scan";
033          case "com.gluonhq.attach.inappbilling" -> "in-app-billing";
034          case "com.gluonhq.attach.localnotifications" -> "local-notifications";
035          case "com.gluonhq.attach.pushnotifications" -> "push-notifications";
036          case "com.gluonhq.attach.runtimeargs" -> "runtime-args";
037          default -> module.substring(19).replace('.', '-');
038        };
039    return Maven.central(MAVEN_GROUP, artifact, version);
040  }
041}
